coupons.name: Fashion20
coupons.details: Get 20% off on all clothing items in the store. Use code 'Fashion20' at checkout.

coupons.name: ClearanceSale
coupons.details: Enjoy an extra 30% discount on clearance clothing items.

coupons.name: HomeSweetHome
coupons.details: Save $50 on all furniture purchases over $500. Use code 'HomeSweetHome' at checkout.

coupons.name: FreeDelivery
coupons.details: Get free delivery on all furniture orders within city limits.

coupons.name: TechSavings
coupons.details: Take 15% off on all electronic gadgets. Use code 'TechSavings' at checkout.

coupons.name: TradeInDeal
coupons.details: Trade in your old device and receive a $50 credit towards a new one.

coupons.name: Grocery10
coupons.details: Receive a 10% discount on your entire grocery purchase with code 'Grocery10'.

coupons.name: BuyOneGetOne
coupons.details: Buy one, get one free on select grocery items.

coupons.name: BeautyCare15
coupons.details: Take 15% off on all beauty and health products. Use code 'BeautyCare15' at checkout.

coupons.name: WellnessDeal
coupons.details: Spend $50 or more on wellness items and receive a $10 gift card.
